meanings.definition: The act of living in or on another organism and obtaining nutrients from it.
meanings.sent1: The parasitization of the tick on the dog weakened the animal.
meanings.sent2: The parasitization of the plant by aphids caused it to wither.
meanings.sent3: The parasitization of the picnic by ants turned it into a feast for them.
meanings.sent4: The parasitization of society by corruption slowly drains its vitality.
meanings.sent5: The parasitization of the tree by mistletoe was evident in its wilting branches.

meanings.definition: The process of being infected or infested by a parasite.
meanings.sent1: The parasitization of the host by the tapeworm led to health issues.
meanings.sent2: The parasitization of the fish by parasites affected its swimming ability.
meanings.sent3: The parasitization of the party by uninvited guests caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: The parasitization of the computer by malware slowed down its performance.
meanings.sent5: The parasitization of the body by viruses can result in illness.
